pr_title: Hide Summary processing type when issue tracker channel is selected

timeline.message: Refactor (Java): Updating the processing type so it is not shown as an option in the UI when an issue tracker channel is selected.

timeline.bodyText:
Why not just make this condition the return statement?
DIGEST doesn't really belong either IMO.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I can change it to make the condition the return. I think DIGEST still fits. DEFAULT would let users have a full audit trail of the components reflected in Jira, while DIGEST would be the current items of concern (without opening issues and potentially closing them in the same batch)
replies.author: jamesrichard91

timeline.message: Updating the processing type inclusion method
